alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 7:52PM AKST until February 18 at 11:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THURSDAY TO 11 AM AKST FRIDAY FOR THE COPPER RIVER BASIN NORTH OF GLENNALLEN... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 inches with locally higher amounts of up to 12 inches. * WHERE...Copper River Basin north of Glennallen. * WHEN...From 9 AM Thursday to 11 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will overspread the Copper River Basin from southwest to northeast Thursday morning. The greatest snowfall totals are expected from the junction of the Richardson Highway and Tok Cutoff northward, including Paxson.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
